observed_behavior: Robot follows group ahead at ~5 ft distance on sidewalk
notes: Maintains respectful following distance behind slower pedestrians

observed_behavior: Robot merges into a street crowded with pedestrians walking same direction
notes: Chooses path with minimal disturbance while maintaining safe clearance

observed_behavior: Robot slows to yield to a couple pushing a stroller across its path
notes: Stops several feet away to allow stroller to pass safely before resuming

observed_behavior: Robot arcs left around man and child standing on sidewalk
notes: Plans a wide path around stationary people instead of squeezing between them

observed_behavior: Robot slows behind a group moving same direction while another group passes opposite
notes: Maintains lane discipline and avoids collisions amid two-way flow

observed_behavior: Robot pauses as an oncoming group occupies the entire sidewalk
notes: Waits for group to clear before continuing

observed_behavior: Robot waits for pedestrians to finish crossing before entering crosswalk
Robot moves toward tent while staying left to avoid a turning truck
notes: Adjusts lateral position to maximize distance from moving vehicle

observed_behavior: Robot moves steadily along pedestrian path with traffic in same direction
notes: No explicit interactions; maintains lane and nominal speed even as individuals cross laterally ahead

observed_behavior: Robot follows pedestrian flow on sidewalk maintaining social distance
notes: Keeps steady pace behind multiple people ahead

observed_behavior: Robot navigates through crowded center and around groups and a queue
notes: Steers wide around line of people and small groups near building window

observed_behavior: Robot climbs four short stair sets choosing less crowded sides
notes: Selects left side when right side occupied by descending pedestrians and switches sides near top when left side blocked

observed_behavior: Robot moves along empty sidewalk with no nearby pedestrians
notes: Maintains straight trajectory at nominal pace
Performs direct crossing at designated crosswalk

observed_behavior: Robot turns through empty plaza area with no interactions
notes: Minimal social context; good baseline for non-interactive motion

observed_behavior: Robot travels along right side of sidewalk as pedestrians move opposite direction
notes: Maintains right-of-way and lane discipline relative to oncoming pedestrians

observed_behavior: Robot crosses street in crosswalk and pauses for turning cars
notes: Yields to vehicles performing right turns before proceeding across crosswalk
